channel.title: [PI] Question [PI] Rep++
channel.description:
Well i recently downloaded Exion something server from server downloads, and I'm new to PI so anyways i came across a big i guess when i try to light a fire it says "Firemaking is disabled" any one know where i can go to enable it?
and also i want a Gnome pilot at the servers home, so then when a person clicks him they would teleport to agility area, where would i go to make the game teleport you there by clicking him? Rep++ if someone tells me how and it works

item.title: [PI] Question [PI] Rep++
item.dc:creator: @Ix_Soulcist_xI Soulcist
item.description:
@Ix_Soulcist_xI wrote:

the knome pilot is in is in the spawn list, search him up then put the coords u want in autospawn.cfg. rep plz

That’s not what he is wanting. He is wanting it so people will click on the NPC, and teleport to whatever area.

Anyway,

I would look in the Firemaking Handler for that, and then for the NPC, I would create a case for him in Client.Java I believe.

Read full topic
